author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Nanjing King-Friend Biochemical Pharmaceutical to pay 2017 A share dividend on April 3
text:
March 28(Reuters) - Nanjing King-Friend Biochemical Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
* Says it will pay a cash dividend of 0.15 yuan per share(before tax) and use additional paid-in capital to distribute 0.3 new shares for every one share to shareholders of A shares recorded on April 2
* Says the companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on April 3 and the dividend will be paid on April 3
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/N7o3aX
